an10.186:1.1: “I will teach you the principle that leads to accumulation and that which leads to dispersal. …
an10.186:1.3: And what is the principle that leads to accumulation?
an10.186:1.6: This is called the principle that leads to accumulation.
an10.186:2.1: And what is the principle that leads to dispersal?
an10.186:2.4: This is called the principle that leads to dispersal.”
